Indonesian government encourages the research and developmen

According to the report from Jakarta Post, a few days ago, a senior official from Indonesian government said that the government is drafting management regulation relevant to encouraging the research and development of greenery vehicles, and the rules are expected to be on formal introduction by the middle of the year.
Indonesia High-tech industry minister, Budi Darmadi, who said that the Indonesian government plans to use the business tax obtained from luxury consumption to support the automotive enterprises to develop more localized greenery cars. Darmadi explained that automotive companies can enjoy excise taxes preferential treatments in various degrees according to the localized components application scale of greenery cars, oily performance of vehicles and the application of environmental protection technology.
After attending the meeting hold in the House of Representatives of Indonesia, Darmadi told reporters that relevant excise taxes preferential treatments and the cancellation of the import tariffs are in the process of discussion.” Darmadi also stressed that Vehicles with high degree localization and fuel-efficient will enjoy different treatments from other common models. Darmadi has put forward a series of conditions for Indonesian localized cars to get government incentives. Auto Key Programmer
Indonesia Treasury fiscal policy commission chief, Bambang Brodjonegoro, who stated that the Indonesian government decided to impose consumption tax on luxury rather than business tax, and this change will reduce the difficulty of collecting tax. On the other hand, the Indonesian government also intends to stimulate the automobile consumption through actively adjusting the motor vehicle tax and the car transaction tax. According to the data revealed by Indonesian car industry association, the domestic auto sales in Indonesia in 2011 has arrived to 894180 units, which has refreshed the record, with a growth of 1993 units. most infromations,please refer to : obd2 connector

The plan of Renault in the next three years has been reveale

According to the report from European worldcarfans, the marketing director of French Renault automotive company, Stephen Norman, who outlined a series of Renault’s new vehicles to be released in the next three years in the recent interview of “car headlines”site, and he also said that samsung will launch a high-end models.

The newly upgraded Twingo will be introduced in 2014, and Norman promised that the car would be a “complete surprise” models. He also said that the Renault will cooperate with Daimler to launch substitute for the current Twingo. The substitute will inherit the original features, and some unexpected new design elements will be developed on this basis.

The photograph of a new generation of Renault Twingo is exposured abroad, in the view of photograph, this kind of model still use a hybrid system, while the size of car body will “shrink” similar to Smart ForTwo. The share of car platforms suggests the “marriage” between the Renault and British Daimler. Other OBD Vehicle Tools

At the same time, Norman also shown that Renault will show the fourth generation of Koleos with a brand-new appearance design and dynamic system on Paris auto show in September. The pictures of prototype in northern Europe have been exposured on internet.

Additional as we have learned, Norman also confirmed that Renault will share Nissan Juke models platform in 2013, but Stephen didn’t give more details, so it is unknown that if the body internal platform structure or entire body design will be shared or not.

It is easy to see from the R Space concept car debuted on the Geneva motor show held in 2011, the new generation of secco ray MPV cars will be put on the agenda. in addition to the width of the same body size, Renault still hope it has cross-country function.

Talking about samsung, a subsidiary of Renault car in South Korea, Stephen Renault admitted that they had lost a lot of money, and puts forward a new product plans. “We plan to make samsung to be as part of the cradle of high-grade car, large new vehicles will improve our sales in the South Korea market.” More information please click to : Auto Diagnostic Tool

Self-Driving Car doesn’t a Dream

By the technolege of car development, car driving by themselfes is no long a dream, the car can drive legally.

Continental, a German company with its U.S. headquarters in Auburn Hills, Mich., removed brake and steering controls in a Volkswagen Passat and replaced them with sensors and advanced technology to read the surroundings and drive accordingly.

To qualify for Nevada’s special license, Continental engineers have racked up and documented almost 10,000 miles of autonomous driving. That included a recent trip from Las Vegas to Brimley, Mich., near Sault Ste. Marie, where Continental has a development and testing center nestled in the forest.

More than 90% of the journey was without a hand on the wheel or a foot on a pedal, said Ibro Muharemovic, one of three engineers riding shotgun.

A final trip is being planned to hit the 10,000-mile mark in the next few weeks.

Most of the technology is already on the market as safety features to avoid accidents or mitigate their severity.

Google started the debate about autonomous driving when it took a Toyota Prius and attached sophisticated but expensive equipment so the car could drive itself.

Engineers at auto supplier Continental want to continue the conversation with a semiautonomous version that is a more affordable and shorter-term solution.

The team equipped a Volkswagen Passat with Continental technology, creating a car that pretty much drives itself in two of the most stressful and least satisfying driving conditions: stop-and-go traffic and boring stretches of highway.

Both companies are chasing the same goals: reduce accidents, congestion and fuel consumption. With driverless cars, the age and state of the driver doesn’t matter, and parking isn’t an issue when cars can drop off passengers and drive home.

“There is a strong business case for an autonomous car that can drop you off or a cab without the expense of a driver,” said Chief Executive Ravi Pandit of KPIT Cummins, a global IT and engineering company in Pune, India.

This is the future of the auto industry, and it is happening faster than consumers realize.

A semiautonomous car is still a couple of years from production, but much of the safety technology that makes it possible is on the market now.

Yet the idea of cars driving themselves raises questions about liability and regulation and whether the public is ready to accept them. Auto Diagnostic Tool
The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration will start studying aspects of autonomous driving in August with a one-year pilot project in Ann Arbor, Mich., to test 3,000 cars with equipment to communicate with one another to prevent accidents. Officials have expressed support for technology that addresses distracted driving and prevents accidents.

“There is a strong business case for an autonomous car that can drop you off or a cab without the expense of a driver,” said Chief Executive Ravi Pandit of KPIT Cummins, a global IT and engineering company in Pune, India.

This is the future of the auto industry, and it is happening faster than consumers realize.

A semiautonomous car is still a couple of years from production, but much of the safety technology that makes it possible is on the market now.

Yet the idea of cars driving themselves raises questions about liability and regulation and whether the public is ready to accept them.

Lexus LF-LC is expected to be put into volume production

According to the British Autocar magazine, Toyota motor company is currently considering to put Lexus LF-LC into volume production. the lexus LF-LC concept car debuted on Detroit auto show at that moment no plan is made to put Lexus LF-LC into volume production. However, because it has made the good response in the auto show, the lexus LF-LC perhaps will no longer just the “concept”. Executives of Toyota company are discussing whether to put this car into quantity production.

Lexus product planning chief, Karl Schlicht said that possibility to put LF-LC into mass production is bigger than before. He said: “although the details hasn’t been decided, we have 50% confidence to put this models into volume production. LF-LC is very popular in Geneva motor show earlier this month, Toyota executives fully recognized this. And now we need to consider how to promote this thing, and then take out a feasible mass production plan.” VOLVO VIDA DICE

LF-LC is mainly design by lexus Calty studio in California, the design style reflects the lexus family-based characteristics, also reveals a new design concept of lexus brand. Mass production version of LF-LC previous reported may use the lexus LS chassis in shorten edition, so far this news has a fifty percent reliability. And the high-end F model of lexus GS series is likely to adopt LFA V-10 engine. Although the mass production of LF-LC and GS F has not been decided, sales director of lexus, Schlicht said that he is really looking forward the arrival of mass production of this high performance cars.

Brazil is faced with an economic crisis

According to economic data shows that Brazil is the sixth biggest economic giant in the world at present. Brazil is enjoying an economic boom, in some sence due to the reasons discussed in this presentation. The prosperity is flowing down to the middle class. AP reports that Brazilian tourists spent $5.9 billion in the U.S. in 2010. Many would say that the Brazilians, bolstered by a strong currency, saved the retail industry in Miami the last 2-3 years.

In spite of the wide reaching economic prosperity in Brazil, there is one area that concerns me. Imports to Brazil have always been tightly controlled in order to protect local industries. This strategy may have been effective when Brazil was a struggling third world country, but today Brazil is emerging as an economic powerhouse with international political aspirations.

It is reported by Latin Business News that Brazil has requested that Mexico decrease auto exports to Brazil by 33% or $1.4 billion this year. If Brazil is going to aspire to a position of international leadership, it should be fostering more trade in LATAM. Such an approach to trade would increase its political clout. OBDMATE OM510

If Brazil were to expand its political influence, especially in LATAM, such an approach would force the U.S. to pay more attention to LATAM. More attention from the U.S. would theoretically foster greater economic development in LATAM and benefit Brazilian exports.

BMW X1 is a luxury crossover in slightly smaller size

According to the relevant data, BMW’s SUV business has never been stronger, and the German luxury automaker expects to stay ahead of its rivals Mercedes and Audi with this: the X1, a compact luxury crossover loading in the United States for the first time later this year. Given the demand for all things SUV, and most things with a BMW badge on them, even a $35,000 crossover that’s slightly smaller than a Toyota Prius v should do brisk business.

For its American debut at the New York Auto Show, BMW freshened the exterior of the X1, matching the more up-to-date look of the new 3-Series, and gave the interior a minor touch-up. Under the hood, BMW will offer two turbocharged engines, a 240-hp four-cylinder and a 300-hp straight six, both tied to an automatic transmission and stop-start fuel savers. The base X1 can be bought as a rear-wheel-drive only setup with a base sticker price of $31,545, with the top all-wheel-drive version priced at $39,345 — when it is issued late this year. MemoScan VAG5053

BMW didn’t announce fuel economy figures, but for the moment the market for mini luxury SUVs consists of the X1, the upcoming Buick Encore and…Mini, whose Countryman comes close to the X1 in size and with some crossover in price. Don’t be surprised if a few more models arrive by next year.

Jaguar F-Type will come to market in 2013 as E-Type’s succ

In accordance with the relevant report from foreign media that Jaguar F-Type will be released in 2013, which is the successor of Jaguar E-Type, also it is Jag’s first two-seater in over 50 years.

Jaguar says that after 37 years it will build a spiritual successor to its iconic E-Type roadster called, logically enough, the F-Type. On the basic of the C-X16 concept shown last year, Jaguar says the new F-Type will be officially issued late this year and go on sale in 2013. The company also claims that the car will accelerate to 60 mph in less than 5 seconds and achieve a top speed of more than 180 mph. To further whet our appetites, it provided a few shots showing an F-Type prototype hiding in plain sight.

1961 Jaguar E-Type convertibleThe long-nose E-Type ranks among the greatest cars ever built — one that not only won on racetracks around the world but set a style standard that Jaguar has reached for ever since. In 1996, the Museum of Modern Art in New York added an E-Type to its permanent collection. Benz AK400 key Programmer

Over the years the company has considered building other successors, even showing another F-Type concept in 2002, but years of financial trouble led Jaguar to focus on higher volume, higher profit models. With sales rising under ownership by India’s Tata Motors, Jaguar has enough capital to restore a classic.

Intel chips will be adopted in Nissan vehicles

It is learned from the news reported by American bloomberg that Nissan Motor will apply Intel microprocessor in its IVI since 2013, which is Japan’s second largest car maker, located in yokohama. this action will reduce the dependent of this global largest chip maker on computer company.

On April 5, Nissan unveiled a LE concept car of Infiniti in New York international auto show, this model adopted double screen displays supported by the Intel atom chip.

The president of Intel, Paul Otellini, who regards the automobile industry as a important chance for company’s diversification. At present, the personal computer business accounts for more than 90% of the total income of Intel. At the same time, Intel also cooperates with BMW and Daimler company, and it makes publicity to more car companies that improved calculation function can attract more customers.

“Chip processor industry is in a important transition, it will open more cooperation with automobile industry,” vice President of Intel intelligent system, Ton Steenman, who said in a statement that “Intel company has been walking in the forefront of the industry”.

Executive vice President of Nissan responsible for Infiniti, Andy Palmer, who said in a statement that Intel will help Nissan to introduce consumer electronics products functions in its vehicles. Probe-In Video Scope

The sale of Dongfeng Nissan has been making new record

The vice general manager of Dongfeng Nissan, RenYong, who recently said that its next goal is to achieve 1 million units in 2012 with a growth of nearly 25% on the basis of the sales of 800000 units in 2011. and it intends to enter into the first three of this industry before 2015. Therefore, Dongfeng Nissan launched a series of actions.

It is reported that Dongfeng Nissan achieved the sales of 808588 units in 2011 under some adverse conditions, such as the Japanese earthquake, Japanese yen appreciation and the slowdown in the whole car market. And it’s sale has ranked the fourth among the domestic joint automobile ventures.New CAN OBDII SCANNER
“The marketing system reform carried on in 2012 will be divided into three main shaft: the area, the function, the brand axial shaft axis.” Dongfeng Nissan marketing headquarters deputy chief minister, YangSong said. In the past, Dongfeng Nissan only has homebred models of NISSAN brand, in 2012 then will launch rev. Calvin volume production of NISSAN car and one, so dongfeng NISSAN in brand axis on reform of the established rev. Calvin group and one room; Set up four big area Marketing Department, this is the area of the shaft reform; And in the function of the shaft on reform, and set up a new functional departments-digital Marketing Department, in response to the needs of the development of precision Internet marketing.

And for the “regional system” improvement outside paid much attention to, YangSong said: “the local resources and authority we delegated way down are divided into seven categories, such as the right to make ttargets, the business policy formulation, the right of resources and review the right down, rewards and punishments, the right of the meeting, the right of the management of the personnel, the distinct demarcation on the seven categories.”

Japan has developed electromobile with cold resistance

According to the news reported on 27 April by Kyodo News that Hirosaki University in Japan has developed electromobile with cold resistance recently, and the test drive of this electromobile has been held in Sendai on 27 of April. This vehicle can be applied in the north area as usually where the tempreture in winter is below 0?. The users don’t need to worry about attenuation of electric quantity.
It is always a weakness of electromobile that electric quantity will decrease under Cold Temperatures. While the electromobile with cold resistance can solve this problem through installing stanby gas engine. The odometer of electromobile under 0? is only about half of which under 25?. This electromobile installed with a small gas engine to supply heating and charge battery, therefore, the number of on-board batteries shrank by 10%. In addition, this MATIC is equipped with a electromotor on inside wheel to insure the security when driving in snow accumulation. The researchers hopes that this electromobile can be put into practical operation after 5 years. Code Reader Scanner
The professor of Hirosaki University and golden core member of this research group, TianZongSheng expressed that this electromobile with cold resistance is expected to be promoted to the world, and the Automobile industry will be introduced into northeast and Hokkaido to promote the reconstruction of Japan after the Earthquake.
More information please refer to : gm tech 2
